Summary: moving light 90 degree turn followed by 2 helicopters and AWAX
trends: There has been one other sighting in Loughborough
There were no other sightings in Loughborough on or around June 19th 1989
divs: Sighting DetailsIn 1989 me and a friend were out hunting rabbits in local fields in Mansfield,Nottinghamshire,England about 8.30pm when we heard a noise of a large plane high in the sky, as we were looking for the plane we noticed a light comming towards us at high speed,it was nearly overhead when it did a 90 degree turn (like using a set square) without slowing down and dissapeared off into the distance,as we stood totally shocked by this about 5 seconds later 2 dark helicopters follwed the same path banked and too went off into the distance after the light. The original soung of a high flying plane(we believe it was a A.W.A.X. early warning aircraft) was there all the time but now we could see its lights very high in the sky and this follwed the same path and turned at the same point following. Nothing has ever happened to us like this before we have seen police helicopters over us and know how they behave at nite but nothing like this.
